scripts.allure:generate:open: allure generate allure-results & allure open allure-report
scripts.cy:headless: npx cypress run cy:clear --config video=false --env allure=true
scripts.cy:headless:video: npx cypress run cy:clear --config video=true --env allure=true
scripts.cy:chrome: npx cypress run cy:clear --config video=false --env  allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.cy:chrome:video: npx cypress run cy:clear --config video=true --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.test:chrome:report: npx cypress run cy:clear cy:chrome:video allure:generate:open
scripts.test:headless:report: npx cypress run cy:clear cy:headless allure:generate:open
